amendment.description: To require a report assessing the increased risk of terrorist attacks in the United States if the Government of Saudi Arabia were to cease Yemen-related intelligence sharing with the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4095 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S7563; text: CR S7563) To require a report assessing the increased risk of terrorist attacks in the United States if the Government of Saudi Arabia were to cease Yemen-related intelligence sharing with the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4095 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
